name: Lazer Shock
description:
Dodge lazers, collect powerups! 

Endless, infinite game of fun

Don't stop moving or you'll burst

-------------------------------------------------------------

This project was exported from Scratch and converted by Turbowarp Packager

This game is made by me

Scratch version: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/770088176/

-------------------------------------------------------------

Use WASD, or arrow keys

Instructions written in "How to play" in game

-------------------------------------------------------------

>Code

- Me (Epic2236)

- Some other YouTubers for animation scripts & stuff

>Art

- By me, using scratch editor

>Songs (all from Newgrounds)

- Peasant-Mocking Pleasantries Remix by midgetsausage (intro)

- Kerfuffle by FJOB

- Bitcrash by GavTV

- Cassandra's Crypt by Hyenaedon

- Delta Time by CarpetBakery

- Downstreet by MelonadeM

- MAMA LUIGI by MelonadeM

- To Those Who Yet Live by BlazingDragon (death screen)

>Sounds

All from scratch audio library
